type: The National Research Council’s (NRC) Energy, Mining and Environment (EME) Vancouver branch has a requirement for one high current potentiostat/galvanostat for single cell electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy.
description: Tenders are invited from qualified suppliers to provide one high current potentiostat/galvanostat for single cell electrochemical measurements, including electrochemical impedance spectroscopy, and provide training and installation assistance.
